title: Leaderboards? aka Search Feature still busted

comments.author: Nabrok.9023
comments.body: There isn’t an official API for it. A scraper isn’t hard to put together though. Use responsibly.

comments.author: Darkorical.9213
comments.body:
I was wondering if the API included the leader boards specifically the achievement one I think it would be neat to have on our website a ticker showing peoples achievement points.

I did not find it but I also did not find it listed in the suggestions and assumed I wouldn’t be the first to ask for it. so I’m posting here
